message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope this is within your acceptable range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000. It's a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this happen!
